Package sv.grabber.productdatacrc1

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseSource
    Implementation of all necessary methods to interact with SQLite database.
    DatabaseTable
    Implementation of database table object to store table and columns names.
    GrabberFileManipulator
    Implementation of all necessary methods to interact with files on disk.
    Main
    Entry point to the Product Data Grabber that provides a interactive menu to parse list of CRC product pages for product variations, show results, output results to csv files, store results in the DB, read/write configuration data from/to the text and binary files and also query the database for a particular product (see ProductDataGrabber).
    ProductDataGrabber
    The Product Data Grabber retrieves actual data (size, price, discount, availability, color, etc) for a particular set of product variations from CRC product pages, shows the results and stores them to different targets, like SQLite database, csv files.
    ProductDataset
    Implementation of product data set to store product search configuration.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ProductDataGrabber.SizeType
